data.eml:eml: Revision of the Ulopinae leafhoppers (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) of the Indian subcontinent, I. Ulopini genera: Daimachus, Radhades and Ulopsina

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Viraktamath, C. A., Webb, M. D. (2019): Revision of the Ulopinae leafhoppers (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) of the Indian subcontinent, I. Ulopini genera: Daimachus, Radhades and Ulopsina. Zootaxa 4613 (3): 557-577, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4613.3.8
